name: SMS Matrix
tag_list: sms-messaging, 2-way-messaging, voice-broadcase, grouping-messaging, virtural-phone-number, mobile-alert, text-to-speech-messages, sms-gateway, smtpemail-gateway, tts
overview:
SMS Matrix Messaging Solutions - We Connect People

At SMS Matrix our content delivery platform allows you to easily send messages to every phone number on your list. Businesses, search-and-rescue teams, schools, help desks, medical clinics, utilities and municipalities across the country rely on our solutions for emergency alerts and business related notifications.

Reach thousands of worldwide mobile or landline numbers in minutes using a reliable and cost-effective automated messaging service. Our system has capabilities to handle thousands of messages per minute, be it Voice, SMS texts, Email, Fax or Text-to-Speech. Content is delivered within seconds to more than 200 countries worldwide.

. Mobile Alerts & Notifications . Group Messaging . Appointment Reminders . Virtual Phone Numbers for 2-Way SMS messaging . SMS Gateway . Text-to-Speech messages . Send messages via SMTP/Email Gateway

Deliver the same content to members of your group no matter how large or small. Increase productivity and profitability in your organization using a group messaging capability that can be used to remind members about events, meetings, special sales, deadlines and promotions.

Build brand awareness with SMS Matrix and maximize your return on advertising investment. Leverage the different forms of communication that we offer, SMS texts, Voice, Email and Faxes, to deliver directed customizable messages to individuals or groups in an economically feasible manner.

Our content delivery platform is available as a web-based user interface (WUI) or programmatically through our SMS Gateway product line. The platform is pre-packaged with everything you need, and provides an easy means to schedule messages for delivery in advance, manually start, stop, restart or delete them, as well as track, record and view the delivery status using a drill-down capability for greater detail.

Build customized fully secure messaging solutions tailored to meet the demands of your business. With SMS Matrix, connect with your audience.
